description.@en: I would never come to a party without a gift, so why would you think I’d come unprepared for this trip?

data.notes: Every Profession possesses a unique knack, an ability that no other Profession has access to. The Trait immediately follows the Profession’s description.

effect.@en: Whenever you need a mundane item in hand valued less than 1 pound (£), you do not have to spend a Coin to edit the situation. You may take advantage of this Trait once a game session. The Historian may impose other limits.
